headline: Turkey Colocation Data Center Portfolio Analysis Report 2025-2029: Key Locations, White-floor Space, IT Load Capacity, Retail and Wholesale Colocation Pricing
summary: Explore a comprehensive Excel database detailing the Turkey data center market, offering in-depth analysis of 32 existing and 5 upcoming colocation data centers. Key locations include Ankara, Bursa, Denizli, Istanbul, Izmir, and Tekirdağ. The database provides insights into upcoming white-floor space, IT load capacity projections for 2025, and future capacity expansions through 2029. Discover current retail and wholesale colocation pricing across various rack configurations and power usage. Majo
